answers.answer: Definitely ask your Dr.  mine is usually low blood sugar.
I shake because I have iron deficiency, but it is most likely low blood sugar.

More than likely low blood sugar... make sure you are eating and having snacks throughout the day. .. when I feel really shaky like that I know its low blood sugar (I have gestational diabetes) and I drink some juice or eat some fruit

question: What does it mean when  my hand shake?
title: shaking hand
